description: Two ingredients are all you need to make this flatbread recipe. Serve with dips, or try using your flatbread as a pizza base. The possibilities are endless.
keywords: Flatbread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Father's Day,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Two-Ingredient Flatbread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup self-raising flour (plus extra for dusting)
1 tsp extra virgin olive oil (for cooking)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a large bowl with a pinch of salt. Using clean hands, mix ingredients until a shaggy dough forms.
Dust a clean work surface with flour, turn out dough and knead until smooth, then form into a ball. Halve ball of dough, then roll each half out to approximately 20cm rounds.
Heat a non-stick frying pan on low-medium heat and lightly grease with extra virgin olive oil. Cook flatbreads for about 2 minutes on each side or until golden.
